thread.title: Paris Jackson sparks rumours she's dating TOWIE star Lydia Bright's ex-boyfriend, Tom Kilbey
thread.title_full: Paris Jackson sparks rumours she's dating TOWIE star Lydia Bright's ex-boyfriend, Tom Kilbey - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Paris Jackson sparks rumours she's dating TOWIE star Lydia Bright's ex-boyfriend, Tom Kilbey
text:
Paris Jackson sparks rumours she's dating TOWIE star Lydia Bright's ex-boyfriend, Tom Kilbey Michael Jackson's 18-year-old daughter is thought to have struck up a friendship with the former TOWIE hunk   Share   Comments By Joshua Haigh 18:06, 21 FEB 2017 Celebs New couple? (Photo: AKM-GSI-XPOSURE)   Share   Comments Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email TOWIE viewers could soon be seeing a new face on the reality series.
Michael Jackson's daughter, Paris, has sparked rumours she's dating an Essex star after recently dumping her long-term boyfriend.
Former ITVBe star and Lydia Bright's ex-boyfriend, Tom Ridley, recently moved to the US where he is currently trying to build a career for himself.
During his time across the pond he bumped into Paris, and it's believed the unlikely pair hit it off.
Paris has been hanging out with Tom (Photo: AKM-GSI-XPOSURE) They've sparked romance rumours (Photo: AKM-GSI-XPOSURE) Tom, who appeared on the reality series back in 2012, was spotted recently hanging out with the newly-blonde star in Los Angeles.
A source told The Sun : “The Towie cast can’t believe it. 
“Tom has been trying to make a name for himself in the States and has managed to become involved in set made up of aspiring young fashion hopefuls.
“They have been getting close and both share the same drive for their careers but it’s believed the relationship is not romantic.”
Read More Paris Jackson splits from her long-term boyfriend to focus on her new TV series Tom with his ex, Lydia Bright (Photo: FilmMagic) Paris recently became single (Photo: REUTERS) The 18-year-old actress - who is the daughter of the late Michael Jackson - broke up with Michael Snoddy after almost a year of dating last month.
According to reports, the star was determined to not let anything distract her from her role in Lee Daniels' new TV show, Star.
A source said at the time: "Paris ended things with Michael... "She is doing well, enjoying being on set with Lee Daniels and focusing her energy on the opportunities ahead."
